Content: <font color='#C7A758'>The first enemy hit will be haunted for [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_BasilusDagger_MinTurns]-[ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_BasilusDagger_MaxTurns] turns, taking [SkillDamage:Projectile_LLWEAPONEX_BasilusDagger_HauntedDamage] when taking an action (once per turn), with a [ExtraData:LLWEAPONEX_BasilusDagger_BackstabChance]% chance to be backstabbed.</font>
